TutoExplainContent: Chart Activity let your create your charts and organize your information. Try the best chart for your case.
FontColorText: Select this button to change the font color
TitleFontText: Select this button to change the title font
LabelsFontText: Select this button to change the labels font
TickFontText: Select this button to change the tick font
PieChartText: Select this button to draw a pie Chart
Label: Label
TutoAddData: This button allow you to add a line of data to create the graph. Label and value are set randomly but of course you can change them
TutoRemoveButton: This button allow you to remove the selected line of data
TutoChartTitle: To change the graph title, just change the activity title
TutoChartType: Next you can change the type of graph
VerticalBars: Select this button to draw vertical bars
HorizontalBars: Select this button to draw horizontal bars
Lines: Select this button to draw a lines chart
TextPaletteText: This menu allow you to change style and colors of the text around the chart
TutoConfig: This menu you can change the colors or the horizontal and vertical labels in the configs toolbar
TutoSaveImage: Save your chart as an image in the Journal
TutoViewCsv: Select this button to view your data as a grid. This is the default view for a CSV file
TutoCsvColumn1: The first column represents the labels to make a chart
TutoCsvColumn2: The second column represents the numeric values for the chart
TutoCsvNumOnly: Make sure that the second column contains numeric values only
TutoCsvRightArr: Click this button to move the selected column to the right
TutoCsvLeftArr: Click this button to move the selected column to the left
SelectFontText: Select this button to choose the font
